com.k2.Proforma

Class Proforma

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Proforma.Proforma
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Part

    public class Proforma
extends java.lang.Object
implements Part
    A proforma is a simple string template comprising lines of parts Each line in the proforma is output to the given writer with a implementation system specific carriage return or the carriage return specified by the call to setCarriageReturn(...) Each line comprises parts. Parts can be plain strings, parameters or other proformas. A proforma can optionally automatically increase the indent given to it for output. This is useful when embedding proformas in other proformas to automatically increase the indent for embedded proformas;
    Author:
    simon

      static class  Proforma.CarriageReturn
      A convenience enumeration to specify the MS DOS carriage return or the UNIX carriage return

        public java.io.Writer write(int i,
